Subject:Re: Seahawks tickets
Message 3845 of 4024
Hey-
This is not an escalation. As we discussed, it is a simple request to address outstanding issues without including the attorneys. But I don’t know what
you are expecting if you are not responsive. Please help me figure out how.
• On 7/10, Adrian requested a Karin meeting to share his wishes. On 8/18 and 8/21, we confirmed Adrain feels safe seeing me solo when I blow. It's
been fifty-three days since AD's request. When will we honor those?
• On 7/15, I offered a way to comply with our court order. You never replied. On 8/05, despite our order, you took ~$400k in stock and $15k in cash.
I have been working since to try to fix it, but we are still dead in the water.
• On 8/17, after asking several times about our Seahawks tickets, I tried to make some progress. Obviously, AD's decision to honor his wishes matter
Sent:08/29/2024 at 11:38 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 08/29/2024 at 12:57 PM)
Subject:May We Please Work Together?
